data.lyric:
[ti:Everybody]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Everybody - Mac Miller
[00:01.09]Composed：A.Lee
[00:02.18]Everybody's gotta live everybody's gonna die
[00:19.25]Everybody just wanna have a good good time
[00:27.17]I think you know the reason why
[00:33.06]Oh oh oh oh
[00:45.30]Oh oh oh oh
[01:00.12]Everybody's gotta live everybody's gonna die
[01:12.69]Everybody's gotta live
[01:18.89]I think you know the reason why
[01:23.81]Yeah sometimes the going gets so good yeah
[01:31.87]But then it can get pretty rough yeah
[01:38.06]But when I have you in my arms baby
[01:42.71]You know I just can't I just can't get enough
[01:50.63]Everybody's gotta live everybody's gonna die
[02:03.23]everybody's gonna try to
[02:04.70]Have a good good time
[02:09.51]I think you know the reason why
[02:15.06]Saw a blind man standin'
[02:16.57]On the corner baby yeah
[02:21.64]He couldn't hardly tie his shoes yeah
[02:28.00]Harmonica and guitar strapped around his neck oh
[02:33.36]But he sure could he sure could
[02:35.98]Play the blues yeah
[02:41.27]Everybody's gotta live everybody's gonna die yeah
[02:54.01]Everybody's gonna try to have a good good time
[03:00.01]I think you know the reason why yeah
[03:07.65]Feel like I've seen a million sunsets yeah
[03:12.39]If you're with me I'll never go away
[03:18.60]That's when I stopped and took a look at my baby
[03:24.96]She said if you're with me I won't go away
[03:29.49]Because everybody's gotta live everybody's gonna die
[03:44.37]Everybody's gonna try to have a good good time
[03:50.52]I think you know the reason why
data.trans:
[ti:Everybody]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.09]//
[00:02.18]人生在世 总是难逃一死
[00:19.25]每个人都想纵享欢乐 恣意人生
[00:27.17]我想你深知个中缘由
[00:33.06]//
[00:45.30]//
[01:00.12]人生在世 总是难逃一死
[01:12.69]每个人都得活下去
[01:18.89]我想你深知个中缘由
[01:23.81]有时候 诸事顺遂
[01:31.87]随后又波折不断
[01:38.06]可是宝贝 当我拥你入怀
[01:42.71]你知道我无法得到满足
[01:50.63]人生在世 总是难逃一死
[02:03.23]每个人都想纵享欢乐
[02:04.70]恣意人生
[02:09.51]我想你深知个中缘由
[02:15.06]我看见盲人
[02:16.57]伫立在角落里
[02:21.64]他连鞋带都系不了
[02:28.00]脖子上架着口风琴 身上背着吉他
[02:33.36]可他十分笃定
[02:35.98]他可以演奏悠扬的蓝调
[02:41.27]人生在世 总是难逃一死
[02:54.01]每个人都想纵享欢乐
[03:00.01]我想你深知个中缘由
[03:07.65]仿佛我已看过数百万次落日
[03:12.39]如果你与我相伴一生 我便不离不弃
[03:18.60]就在那时 我停下脚步 凝望我的宝贝
[03:24.96]她说如果你和我在一起 我就不会弃你而去
[03:29.49]因为人生在世 总是难逃一死
[03:44.37]每个人都想纵享欢乐 恣意人生
[03:50.52]我想你深知个中缘由
